name: Stunt Moto Racing
description:
Stunt Moto Racing is the coolest Moto Racing game ever, ride your furious Moto, wipe all the obstacles away. Start a Moto Tour, prove yourself an Moto Racing Conqueror!


Easy controls, concentrate on your racing, leave those levels behind you. Take control of your love Moto, speeding, Jumping, and dodging obstacles. Also enjoy the scenery of country road, seacoast, forest wonderland etc. As you get familiar with gameplay modes, you will fall in love with it extremely!

Stunt Moto Racing Features:
- Easy controls
- Free to download
- 60+ specialized tracks
- 2 game modes
- Endless mode is more stunning

Now, cut off the crap talking, let’s take an exciting adventure in Stunt Moto Racing!
